amendment.description: Amendment sought to extend for two years the deadline by which the State of New York is required to repay to the Highway Trust Fund funds previously provided for a project (Westway) that has since been terminated.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 24 in the Congressional Record of September 19, 1995, to require tolls collected on bridges connecting Brooklyn and Staten Island be collected only on those vehicles arriving on Staten Island.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
